data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Karaikal who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Karaikal, Puducherry, India

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Karaikal, Puducherry, India to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Karaikal, Puducherry, India. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Karaikal to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 2,202 believers in Karaikal, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 2,202 believers in Karaikal to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.section_summary:
the county of Karaikal, Puducherry, India has a population of 200,200.

We estimate Karaikal has 2,202 people who might know Jesus, 2,429 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 195,569 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Karaikal, Puducherry, India from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.
